code: import{api}from'./api';export const categoryAPI={getAllCategories:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/categories');return response.data;},getCategoryById:async id=>{const response=await api.get(`/categories/${id}`);return response.data;},createCategory:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/categories',data);return response.data;},updateCategory:async(id,data)=>{const response=await api.put(`/categories/${id}`,data);return response.data;},deleteCategory:async id=>{await api.delete(`/categories/${id}`);}};
